Sequence Information.Peptide Name: A37 A1 guan / Apidaecin 1b O1 R10 O17 guan, Api134

UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Insect-derived short proline-rich and murine cathelicidin-related antimicrobial peptides act synergistically on Gram-negative bacteria in vitro.
Literature.Author: Knappe D, Kabankov N, Herth N, Hoffmann R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli BL21AI(MIC=2µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 10240(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli DSM 1103(MIC=32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae DSM 681(MIC=16µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis DSM 347(MIC=>128µg/ml),Escherichia coli 45849(MIC=16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae 123132(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi S5(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli D31(MIC=16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae K6 ATCC 700603(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 700408(MIC=2µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32.0µg/ml),Escherichia coli DSM 5923(MIC=4.0µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae DSM 11678(MIC=128.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa DSM 9644(MIC=128.0µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae DSM 681(MIC=74.7µg/ml)
